alert.note: Alert for Lincoln (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 10 at 7:53PM CDT until July 10 at 8:45PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: The National Weather Service in North Platte has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Lincoln County in southwestern Nebraska... * Until 845 PM CDT. * At 752 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Lake Maloney State Recreation Area, or near North Platte, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Two inch hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lake Maloney State Recreation Area. This includes the following highways... Interstate 80 in Nebraska between mile markers 171 and 174. Highway 83 between mile markers 66 and 80. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...2.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
